content.raw: ya we just have to play by the rules of the urdf parser but it's hard to understand what it's actually doing. Another thing to try would be to prevent lumping of links caused by fixed joints using the [preserveFixedJoint tag](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/sdformat/pull-requests/352). e.g. `<gazebo reference='your_joint_name'><preserveFixedJoint>true</preserveFixedJoint></gazebo>`
